STIS Coronagraph
STIS Coronagraph

• Primarily a spectrograph • CCD, 50 mas pixels, 52” x 52” field • Unfiltered imaging over l = 0.2 - 1.0 mm • Occulters are crossed wedges: d = 0.5”-2.8”
